title: undan sannidhi
sahitya:
undan sannidhi vandaDaindEnnayyA pantaLan maindA bhaktarkku meyyA


anupallavi

  kandavEL sOdarA kaliyuga varadA antamillA vAzhvaruLum aparimita tUyA


caraNam    mundai vinai ozhiya bandhamelAm kaLaindE cintaiyil unai nirutti vandanai pala purindEn
endanai ATkoLa tAmadamEnayyA sundarat-tamizh kavijnar nAvil urai nEyA
